title: Me and Mr. Claus
description: Darlene Panzera is Avon Books' and Debbie Macomber's Make Your Dreams Come True contest winner.Kristen is upset when her boss gives her an ultimatum: play "Mrs. Claus" for the advertising agency's three charity events for children or be fired.She decides becoming Mrs. Claus is better than being unemployed - but not by much.Can a handsome young "Santa" help her discover the joys of the season and find the true spirit of Christmas?
author: Darlene Panzera
